mapper.insert: insert into board(user_id, title, content, type_num) values(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, 2)

insert into PT_group(board_num, start_date, end_date, max_user, keyword, pt_img_file) values((select board_num from board where title=#{title} and user_id=#{user_id} and content=#{content}), #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{max_user}, #{keyword}, #{pt_img_file})
mapper.select:
select b.board_num, user_id, title, hit, date_format(write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') write_date, state, start_date, end_date, max_user, keyword, pt_img_file from board b inner join PT_group p on b.board_num=p.board_num where type_num=2
and (title like '%${searchWord}%' or keyword like '%${searchWord}%' or content like '%${searchWord}%' or user_id like '%${searchWord}%')
order by b.board_num desc

select b.user_id, b.board_num, title, keyword, state, content, start_date, end_date, datediff(end_date, start_date) datecal, pt_img_file, max_user from board b inner join PT_group p on b.board_num=p.board_num where b.board_num=#{param1}

select u.user_id, user_email, user_name, user_nickname, tel, profie_img, height, gender, age, w.weight, w.write_date from user u left join weigth w on u.user_id=w.user_id where u.user_id=(select user_id from board where board_num = #{param1}) order by w.write_date desc limit 1
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where board_num=${param1}
mapper.delete: delete from board where board_num=#{param1} and user_id=#{param2}
